entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 12 February 2023
